channel.title: CVE Feed for ninjateam -- Live Chat with Facebook Messenger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ninjateam -- Live Chat with Facebook Messenger

item.title: CVE-2023-5740|2024-08-02T08:07:32.683Z -- ninjateam -- live%20chat%20with%20facebook%20messenger
item.description: The Live Chat with Facebook Messenger plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'messenger' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
